Hi, I'm a pretty frequent animator of these screens..

I think that would be a cool feature too, but I also don't know if it's something we'll end up making; The next best thing for now is the [League Screensaver app](http://screensaver.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US), which has all of our animated login art ready to view! And we also have the official [youtube playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLbAFXJC0J5GZHUtGea_zQR0OyD3UBuw9s) if you feel like taking a trip down memory lane, music included.

You may already know about those, but just wanted to make sure in case you missed them. We're glad you've enjoyed our past logins enough to be requesting this in the first place, so thank you!
